title: EYL #193 Rio Ferdinand on Business, Manchester United, & His Media Empire
itunes:title: EYL #193 Rio Ferdinand on Business, Manchester United, & His Media Empire
description:
Rio Ferdinand is one of the greatest soccer players of all time. He is now an entrepreneurial and media superstar.

We sat down with him in London for an epic conversation. He went over his media company, his angel investing portfolio, Manchester United, and more. He also spoke about being a sports commentator, and the current state of sports in the U.K. #ManchesterUnited #soccer #RioFerdinand

EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

Link for Invest Fest: https://investfest.com/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
